adviseScripts.text:
Boss!
Folks at the Outpost are always complaining about the construction noise!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: But... it's construction! It's gonna be loud no matter what!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: What should I do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Give them ear plugs.
Make it louder!
No!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: If they can't hear what's going on, it'd be even more dangerous!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Anyway, thanks for your advice!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Oh! You mean we should speed up the construction, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text:
Got it!
I'll try my best!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Centi about construction noise.
I have a question!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Does all my noise make you uncomfortable?
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Actually, it energizes me!
It is like a lullaby to me.

Really?!
Well, I know I really make a lot of noise.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: So, I'm glad it gives you energy!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Maybe I should talk this loud all the time!!!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Seriously?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I'm afraid you might need to see a doctor!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Centi about appropriate chatting volume.
I'm trying to come up with a new architectural design!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: What do you think? Should design be practical and plain...
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Or fancy, if a little inconvenient?
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I just can't make up my mind!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Why not practical AND fancy?
If you can't decide, just build two buildings!
No way!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: If that was a possibility, I wouldn't be in this pickle in the first place!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Yeah! You're right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I've got the time! I've got the materials!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I'll just build two!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I look over some designs with Centi.
I love building!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: But, space here is so limited!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I'm terrified I'll run out of spots to build on before long!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: We'll take back the surface soon!
If that happens, just tear it all down and start over!
That's the coolest thing you've ever said, Boss!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: It may just be big talk, but it still sounds so cool!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I would never tear down something I built myself!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: My buildings are like my children!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I could never do that to them!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I learn a lot about the building zones from Centi.
One time, my hammer broke and we had to stop working for a while!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Because of that delay, we couldn't finish the building according to schedule!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text:
A building schedule is like a promise!
I can't go around breaking my promises!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Bad things happen from time to time!
A good builder does not blame their tools!
I didn't come to you for comforting words, Boss!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I'm gonna keep working hard and do my best!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Boss! Are you telling me I'm not good enough?
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text:
Oh, I got it!
What you meant was: where there's a will, there's a way!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Ok! Next time my hammer breaks, I'll keep hammering with my fists!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I discuss the importance of tools with Centi.
If I don't eat regularly, I will have no strength to work!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: But to eat three meals a day, I have to stop working three times a day!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: This really bothers me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Just eat a day's worth of food at once!
Just eat and work at the same time!
Whoa! Good idea!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I'll try it tomorrow!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Better yet, I could eat a whole month's worth of food at once!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: No! That's dangerous!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: You can't get distracted when you work!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: One wrong step and you'd be in a heap of trouble!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Centi about the importance of eating.
Liter is so small!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I just want to pat her on her little head!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: But she would kill me if I did!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Are you afraid of death!?
Don't worry! She wears a helmet!
Life is the most important thing in the world.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Huh! You're right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I'll give it a try!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Before long, I'm gonna wear a hole in her little helmet!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation about Liter with Centi.

I freaking love vehicles!
 I wanna get one!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I just can't decide between a motorcycle or a truck!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Can you pick one for me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: A truck!
A motorcycle!
Yeah, Boss! I think you've got the right idea!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Just think of all the stuff I could fit in there!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I wonder why some people just don't seem to appreciate trucks!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Really? Come to think of it, motorcycles can't carry very many tools!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I couldn't take Liter with me, either!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: So, no motorcycles for me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I talk about driving routes with Centi.
Safety is important!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: But, putting safety first means I have to work slower!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: What should I do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Adjust the project schedule!
No matter what, safety always comes first!
I'll stick to the schedule even if it kills me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I will follow it no matter what!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: You're right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: It may take longer, but it's the right thing to do!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Safety first! Right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Centi about the importance of the project schedule.
I've been to the Outer Rim!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: It's no wonderland, let me tell you! The environment is terrible!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I want to help them, but I don't know what to do!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Give them moral support!
Rebuild the whole Outer Rim!
But that won't improve the environment at all!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: They need houses and utilities, not encouragement!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Copy that!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: It'll take a long time and a whole lot of money!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: But, I'll get it done someday!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Centi tells me more about the Outer Rim.
I still feel really awkward with Volt!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I'm struggling to find ways to get close to him!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Give him lots of treats!
Take him out for walks every day!
If I give him too many treats, I'll be in hot water with Liter!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: And Volt doesn't eat the treats I give him...
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: That's a good idea!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I'm going to take him out for a walk tomorrow on Liter's behalf!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I'll also bring his favorite toys!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Centi and I look into ways of how she can get closer to Volt.
I'm planning on buying a new toolbox,
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: but I'm not sure what color I want to get.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Orange.
Grey.
I don't know, that might be a bit too garish...
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I want to try my best to avoid bright colors.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Nice! That'll complement my clothes perfectly.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: It'll also be harder to see any scuff marks on it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: It's settled then! Grey it is!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Centi and I searched for the ideal toolbox.
I dreamt that Mighty Tools won this year's architectural award.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: The dream was so vivid, I'm still replaying it in my mind!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: That was no dream, that was a vision!
Congratulations!
No kidding! I hope it comes true.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: If Liter and I won an award, I'd be over the moon!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: It was only a dream, but thanks regardless.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I just hope it comes true in real life.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I help Centi prepare an acceptance speech for the awards ceremony.
It's such a pain working in the rain!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I only have two hands, so I can't hold an umbrella.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Wear a raincoat while you're working.
Take a break whenever it starts raining.
That's genius!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Why didn't I think of that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I'll just slip on a raincoat whenever it rains.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Absolutely not!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: If I rested every time it rained, I'd be way behind schedule!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Centi and I vent about what a hindrance rain can be.
Say, do you ever listen to music when you're working?
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Apparently it's supposed to make you more productive.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Soooo, I'm wondering what kind of music I should listen to while I work.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Crank some hip-hop and hammer along to the beat.
Blast some rock music to raise the tempo.
Oooh, that sounds exciting!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Just me, my body, and the rhythm!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: When it comes to construction, it's dangerous to rush things!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I'll have to listen to something else.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Centi and I think about what kind of music she should listen to while working.
I can't imagine life without Liter.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I'm worried I'll be useless without her.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: You're perfectly capable of solving problems on your own.
Don't worry too much about things that haven't even happened yet.
You think so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: It's a relief to hear you say that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I'll try to improve myself more in the meantime!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: You're right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Liter isn't going anywhere, not for now at least!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I just get in my own head too much when I'm alone.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Centi about Liter.
Boss, what do you normally do during your free time?
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Anything to improve me.
Read.
You too?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: That's really impressive!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I study architecture whenever I've got a spare minute.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Oh, cool!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I zonk out as soon as I open a book, so I'm no bookworm.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: How do you do it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Just the idea of going through an entire book makes me drowsy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Centi and I talk about what we do in our spare time.
Boss, do you like crowded places?
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Or do you prefer places with fewer people around?
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Crowded places.
Empty places.
You like crowded places too?
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: You're the same as me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Whenever I see crowds of people visiting the buildings I've constructed, I feel a sense of pride.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: So you prefer silence over the hustle and bustle?
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I'd be bored out of my gourd if there was no one else around.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Not to mention that I'd be out of a job!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Centi and I have a nice heart-to-heart.
Lifetime job security is a thing of the past.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: The idea that my job might disappear one day really bums me out.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I'm pretty sure our jobs are safe.
I'm doing some job hunting on the side myself.
You think so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: That's a relief! I like this job!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: What?! Why would you do that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: This is the perfect job for you already!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Centi and I have a conversation about jobs.
Boss, do you believe in superstition?
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: For me, if my shoelaces are untied before I head out, the rest of the day is all downhill from there.
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: There's got to be some way around this...
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Just don't overthink things and keep working.
Wear shoes without laces.
I try not to think about it, but it keeps popping up in my head!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: I've got to think of a way to get rid of this bad luck!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Shoes without laces!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: That's genius! I'll go buy some right now!
adviseScripts.speaker: Centi

adviseScripts.text: Centi and I talk more about various superstitions.
